resources.string: QuizBox
True
Flase
Shivaji Maharaj was born on Shivaneri Fort.
Shivaji Maharaj was born in 19 February 1640.
Rastramata Jijau was the mother of Shivaji Maharaj.
Mughal is the name of empire founded by Chhatrapati Shivaji.
Shivaji Maharaj was crowned as the king on June 6, 1675.
Shivaji\'s elder brother was Sambhaji Bhosale.
Samarth Ramdas was Shivaji\'s guru.
Shahaji Bhosale was brother of Shivaji Maharaj.
Torna was the first fort conquered by Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.
In 1650 Torna was conquered by Shivaji Maharaj.
Karmaveer Bhau\'s Date of birth was 22 September 1887.
Paigonda Devgonda Patil was the father of Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil.
Gangabai was not Mother of Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil.
The Government of India awarded Bhau with Padma Bhushan in 1959 in India.
Karmaveer Bhaurao Patil was born in Sangli district.
His education took place at Sangli.
His old surname was Desai.
Karmaveer Bhau studied till only the 8th standard.
On 4 Oct 1920,he finally started “Rayat Shikshan Sanstha” in Satara kale.
Brid statement of his Sanstha is स्वलांबही शिक्षण हेच आमचा ब्रीद.
Full name of Jyotiba phule was Mahatma Jyotirao Govindrao Phule.
Mahatma Jyotiba Phule was born on 11 April 1830.
Savitri at the age of 20 was married to Jyotirao.
On September 1874,he formed Satyashodhak Samaj.
Jyotiba Phule educated not his wife.
He was educated in a school established by the Chrisitan Missionaries.
Jyotirao\'s family belonged to mali caste and their original title was ‘Gorhay’.
Gulamgiri written was not by Mahatma Jyotiba Phule.
Phule started his first school for girls in 1848 in Pune.
Jyotirao Phule enrolled in the Scottish Mission High School in Poona in 1841 .
